directions: Stir the tuna, salad dressing, egg, apple, and pecans together in a bowl; season with salt and pepper. Chill in refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can chunk light tuna, drained
1/4 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
title: Tempting Tuna Salad
